title: smurfs
body: why am i vsing smurfs in clash? lol this is bullshit.

replies.body: Riot have added phone verification, but even still there's going to be smurf's, but on the bright side they wont be getting the rewards on their mains etc. They can't exactly do MORE to stop smurfing, as its always been a thing and always will be.
i assume it's limited per phone though. So unless the player has multiple phone numbers, it's still a pretty secure system.
ummmm, verify account with phone number, hmmmmmm ...... ... .. .   hay babe... .. .
